text: @GovRonDeSantis Florida teachers say thanks for the chump change. Betsy DeVos has other plans. COVID19 is killing people. You failed to protect Floridians. You are either incompetent or have malicious intentions throughout this pandemic and lockdown. Starting with unemployment claims!
